headline: Leadership Shake-Up and Expansion at Citizens Financial Group (NYSE:CFG) With New President
summary: Citizens Financial Group (NYSE:CFG) experienced a 4.8% price increase over the last week amid a broader uptick in the market, which rose 5.2%. The promotion of Brendan Coughlin to President, encompassing responsibilities in Consumer and Wealth Management, likely provided positive momentum for the company. Meanwhile, the anticipated departure of CFO John Woods later this year marks a significant leadership transition, which may have contributed to investor interest. Although broader economic...

headline: Citizens names Coughlin president; CFO to join State Street
summary: Citizens Financial Group's promotion of Brendan Coughlin to company president comes at the same time as CFO John Woods prepares to leave for State Street. Both executives have been viewed as potential successors to CEO Bruce Van Saun.

raw.headline: Citizens names Coughlin president; CFO to join State Street
raw.summary: Citizens Financial Group's promotion of Brendan Coughlin to company president comes at the same time as CFO John Woods prepares to leave for State Street. Both executives have been viewed as potential successors to CEO Bruce Van Saun.

headline: Citizens Financial CFO Woods to step down in August, join State Street
summary: (Reuters) -Citizens Financial Group said on Wednesday that Vice Chair and Chief Financial Officer John Woods would leave in August, after more than eight years with the bank.  Woods is set to take over as finance chief at State Street, a separate release from State Street said.  He joined Citizens from Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group in February 2017.

headline: Citizens Financial Services (CZFS) Beats Q1 Earnings Estimates
summary: Citizens Financial Services (CZFS) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 7.38% and 1.02%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Citizens Financial Services: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: MANSFIELD, Pa. AP) — Citizens Financial Services Inc. CZFS) on Wednesday reported net income of $7.6 million in its first quarter.

headline: Citizens Financial Group Elevates Brendan Coughlin to President
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., April 30, 2025--Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE: CFG) today announced that Brendan Coughlin, currently Vice Chair and Head of Consumer, Private Banking and Wealth, has been promoted to President, reporting to Bruce Van Saun, Chairman and CEO. As President, Coughlin will continue to oversee Consumer Banking, Citizens Private Bank, and Wealth, in addition to a recently broadened scope which includes Enterprise Data & Analytics and Marketing.

As President, Coughlin will continue to oversee Consumer Banking, Citizens Private Bank, and Wealth, in addition to a recently broadened scope which includes Enterprise Data & Analytics and Marketing.
